messages: Mark: Phone, wallet, keypass... Phone, wallet, keypass...
(Mark, you son of a donkey. If only you were more aware of your surroundings. You had so much potential in elementary...)
Mark: ...Nina's still there. I can't focus... I'd talk with her, but I don't even know what to say.
Mark: Last time I tried, she got angry and threw up on me...
(Okay, I feel bad for you now.)
Mark: Then again, she's been like that to everyone since Jamie left us...
Mark: If only there was something I could do for her...
